summary: Diff appears to change more than the single specified Landing page button, and it’s not clearly shown (from the truncated diff) that the button now exactly matches Weekly Mountain styling or that the icon inside the button was removed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update ONLY the selected Landing page “Continue with Internet Identity” button to use the exact same visual styling as the Weekly Mountain primary button (“View Today's SweetSteps”) for height, typography, rounding, background, hover, and text colors, without modifying any other Landing page elements.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary indicates other Landing page changes (removal of a second button and styling of a third button), violating the 'ONLY the selected element' constraint. Also, the truncated Landing.tsx snippet does not show the final Button className/props to verify it matches the Weekly Mountain primary button across all specified style attributes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the mountain icon from inside ONLY the selected Landing page button so it renders as text-only while keeping label/behavior unchanged.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated Landing.tsx snippet still imports `Mountain` from `lucide-react`, and the snippet does not show the button’s JSX content to confirm the icon was removed from inside the button.
